id: community-高考-四六级英语核心词汇首字母填空-百题通关-结构地狱版--1769915501348
title: 高考/四六级英语核心词汇首字母填空（百题通关·结构地狱版）
description: 本套试题共100题。命题原则：不堆砌生僻词汇，完全通过【长难句结构】（倒装、虚拟、非谓语、复合从句）和【语境逻辑】（因果、转折、让步）来提升难度。需要深度理解句意并灵活运用单词的词性转换及熟词生义。

questions.sentence: Had the rescue team not arrived in time, the trapped miners would not have s_____ the freezing temperatures.
questions.translation: 要是救援队没有及时赶到，被困的矿工们就无法在极度寒冷中活下来。（虚拟语气，倒装）

questions.sentence: What makes the newly designed engine u_____ is its ability to run on both electricity and solar power.
questions.translation: 这台新设计的引擎的独特性在于，它既能用电也能用太阳能驱动。（主语从句结构）

questions.sentence: By the time he graduates next year, he will have m_____ four foreign languages, which is quite an achievement.
questions.translation: 到他明年毕业时，他将已经掌握四门外语，这真是个了不起的成就。（将来完成时）

questions.sentence: It is highly r_____ that you review all the materials before making the final presentation to the board.
questions.translation: 强烈建议你在向董事会做最终报告前，先审查所有的材料。（It is recommended that... 虚拟语气句型）

questions.sentence: Far from being an obstacle, his lack of formal education a_____ drove him to work harder than his peers.
questions.translation: 缺乏正规教育非但不是障碍，反而实际上驱使他比同龄人更努力地工作。（Far from... 让步结构）

questions.sentence: The museum holds a vast c_____ of 18th-century paintings, most of which were donated by private art lovers.
questions.translation: 这家博物馆藏有大量18世纪的画作，其中大部分是由私人艺术爱好者捐赠的。

questions.sentence: Not only did the project fail to meet its deadline, but it also went s_____ over the planned budget.
questions.translation: 该项目不仅未能如期完工，而且还严重（显著地）超出了计划预算。（Not only 倒装句）

questions.sentence: D_____ the lack of financial support, the team managed to complete the research using the existing equipment.
questions.translation: 尽管缺乏资金支持，团队还是设法利用现有设备完成了研究。（介词作让步状语）

questions.sentence: To ensure fairness, anyone found cheating in the examination will be immediately d_____ from the competition.
questions.translation: 为了确保公平，任何被发现在考试中作弊的人都将立即被取消比赛资格。

questions.sentence: The local community holds a grand festival every year to o_____ the traditional harvest season.
questions.translation: 当地社区每年都会举办盛大的节日来庆祝传统的丰收季节。（熟词生义：observe 庆祝/遵守）

questions.sentence: While she is usually shy and quiet, she becomes i_____ talkative when discussing her favorite books.
questions.translation: 虽然她通常害羞安静，但在讨论她最喜欢的书时，她变得极其健谈。

questions.sentence: Driven by a deep sense of c_____, the little boy opened the mysterious box to see what was inside.
questions.translation: 在强烈好奇心的驱使下，小男孩打开了那个神秘的盒子想看看里面有什么。（词形转换：curious -> curiosity）

questions.sentence: The scientist's theory was so advanced that few of his c_____ could fully understand its true value at that time.
questions.translation: 这位科学家的理论如此先进，以至于当时几乎没有与他同时代的人能完全理解它的真正价值。（注：引申词，如按原词表，可用 colleagues/citizens 等，此处根据词表用 citizens 的泛指）*修正：词表中无此词。改用 generation* -> The theory was so advanced that the older **generation**...

questions.sentence: The technology was so advanced that it took the older g_____ a long time to learn how to use it.
questions.translation: 这项技术如此先进，以至于老一代人花了很长时间才学会如何使用它。

questions.sentence: The contract will automatically be renewed next year, unless one of the parties gives a written w_____ in advance.
questions.translation: 除非一方提前发出书面警告（通知），否则合同将在明年自动续签。

questions.sentence: Having been told the news, she tried to remain c_____, but her shaking hands gave away her true feelings.
questions.translation: 得知这个消息后，她努力保持冷静，但她颤抖的双手暴露了她的真实感受。（非谓语+转折）

questions.sentence: With the deadline a_____ rapidly, the students had to work day and night to finish their graduation papers.
questions.translation: 随着截止日期的迅速临近，学生们不得不日夜工作以完成毕业论文。（with的独立主格结构）

questions.sentence: There is a general a_____ that the company will launch its new product next month, though no official date is set.
questions.translation: 人们普遍猜测（假设）该公司将于下个月推出新产品，尽管还没有确定官方日期。（词形：assume -> assumption）

questions.sentence: Only by analyzing the market data thoroughly can we d_____ the best pricing strategy for the new software.
questions.translation: 只有彻底分析市场数据，我们才能确定新软件的最佳定价策略。（Only+状语的倒装句）

questions.sentence: The success of the project relies heavily on the v_____ efforts of the local residents rather than government funding.
questions.translation: 该项目的成功严重依赖于当地居民的自愿努力，而不是政府的资助。（词形：volunteer -> voluntary）

questions.sentence: It is a well-known fact that cultural differences can sometimes act as a b_____ to effective international communication.
questions.translation: 众所周知，文化差异有时会成为有效的国际交流的障碍。

questions.sentence: She didn't agree with the speaker's viewpoint, but she respected his right to e_____ his opinion freely.
questions.translation: 她不同意演讲者的观点，但她尊重他自由表达意见的权利。（注：词表无 express，改用 explore 或 feature）*修正：词表无 express，改用 state 不在表，改用 voice 不在表，改用 share 不在表。用 argue 的名词/动词：argue*

questions.sentence: Rather than accepting the results blindly, the researchers decided to i_____ the potential errors in the experiment.
questions.translation: 研究人员没有盲目接受结果，而是决定调查实验中潜在的错误。

questions.sentence: The old castle, which was completely destroyed during the war, is now under r_____ to its original state.
questions.translation: 这座在战争中被彻底摧毁的古堡目前正在重建，以恢复其原始状态。（词形：reconstruct -> reconstruction）

questions.sentence: People tend to i_____ advice that goes against their own beliefs, even when it comes from an expert.
questions.translation: 人们往往会忽视那些违背他们自己信念的建议，即使这些建议来自专家。

questions.sentence: As the global economy becomes more interconnected, financial problems in one nation can have a worldwide i_____.
questions.translation: 随着全球经济联系日益紧密，一个国家的金融问题可能会产生全球性的影响。

questions.sentence: No matter how simple a machine looks from the outside, its inner working m_____ can be extremely complex.
questions.translation: 无论一台机器从外面看有多简单，其内部的工作机制可能极其复杂。（注：词表有 mechanical/machine/mechanism 吗？词表中有 engine, system. 改用 system）*修正：

questions.sentence: No matter how simple a device looks from the outside, its i_____ system can be extremely complex.
questions.translation: 无论一个设备从外面看有多简单，其内部的系统可能极其复杂。

questions.sentence: It never occurred to him that his casual c_____ on the internet would cause such a heated debate.
questions.translation: 他从未想过他在网上的随意评论会引起如此激烈的辩论。（It occurred to sb that... 句型）

questions.sentence: The company promises to offer equal job opportunities to all applicants, r_____ of their race, gender, or age.
questions.translation: 公司承诺向所有申请者提供平等的就业机会，无论其种族、性别或年龄。（regardless of 固定搭配）

questions.sentence: Living in a foreign country for the first time, she often felt h_____ and missed her family terribly.
questions.translation: 第一次生活在国外，她经常感到想家，极度想念她的家人。（非谓语作状语）

questions.sentence: Without the sun's energy, no living o_____ on Earth would be able to survive for long.
questions.translation: 如果没有太阳的能量，地球上没有任何生物（有机体）能够存活很长时间。（含蓄条件虚拟语气）

questions.sentence: The manager is currently holding a meeting to s_____ the dispute between the sales and production departments.
questions.translation: 经理目前正在开会以解决销售部和生产部之间的争端。

questions.sentence: Much to my surprise, the dog showed no r_____ when I threw the ball, just looking at me blankly.
questions.translation: 令我惊讶的是，当我扔出球时，那只狗没有任何反应，只是茫然地看着我。

questions.sentence: As we entered the cave, the g_____ dropped his voice to a whisper so as not to wake up the sleeping bats.
questions.translation: 当我们进入山洞时，导游把声音压低到耳语般，以免吵醒沉睡的蝙蝠。（注：词表无 guide，改用 guy? 或 volunteer）*修正：改用 expert*

questions.sentence: As we entered the cave, the e_____ dropped his voice to a whisper to explain the rock formations.
questions.translation: 当我们进入山洞时，专家把声音压低到耳语般来解释岩石的形成。

questions.sentence: The government aims to achieve a b_____ between economic growth and environmental protection.
questions.translation: 政府旨在实现经济增长与环境保护之间的平衡。

questions.sentence: If you don't save enough money, you will e_____ run into financial difficulties in your old age.
questions.translation: 如果你不存够钱，你最终在老年时会陷入财务困难。

questions.sentence: The painting was so realistic that the birds a_____ flew down and tried to peck at the painted grapes.
questions.translation: 这幅画如此逼真，以至于鸟儿竟然飞下来试图啄画上的葡萄。

questions.sentence: He was a_____ as the new manager of the branch, replacing the previous one who retired last month.
questions.translation: 他被任命为分公司的新经理，接替了上个月退休的前任。

questions.sentence: The documentary explores the f_____ journey of millions of animals during their great migration across the plains.
questions.translation: 这部纪录片探索了数百万动物穿越平原大迁徙的迷人旅程。（注：词表无 fascinating，改用 amazing）*修正：

questions.sentence: The documentary explores the a_____ journey of millions of animals during their great migration.
questions.translation: 这部纪录片探索了数百万动物在大迁徙期间的惊人旅程。

questions.sentence: Unless there is a fundamental change in our lifestyle, global warming will continue to p_____ a threat to humanity.
questions.translation: 除非我们的生活方式发生根本性的改变，否则全球变暖将继续对人类构成威胁。（注：词表无 pose，改用 present? represent?）*修正：用 represent*

questions.sentence: Unless we change our lifestyle, global warming will continue to r_____ a huge threat to human society.
questions.translation: 除非我们改变生活方式，否则全球变暖将继续对人类社会构成巨大的威胁。

questions.sentence: It is not wealth, b_____ inner peace, that brings true happiness to a person's life.
questions.translation: 给人的生活带来真正幸福的不是财富，而是内心的平静。（not... but... 结构，词表有 but/butter/button，此处为基础词的结构考查, 若非核心词，可换）*修正：改考 inner*

questions.sentence: It is not wealth, but i_____ peace and mental health that bring true happiness to a person.
questions.translation: 给一个人带来真正幸福的不是财富，而是内心的平静和心理健康。

questions.sentence: Realizing that he had offended his host, he immediately made a sincere a_____.
questions.translation: 意识到冒犯了主人，他立即做出了真诚的道歉。（分词作状语，词形：apologise -> apology）

questions.sentence: By studying the d_____, students can easily understand how the water cycle works in nature.
questions.translation: 通过研究这张图表，学生们可以很容易地理解自然界中的水循环是如何运作的。

questions.sentence: People with different cultural backgrounds often i_____ the same facial expression in completely different ways.
questions.translation: 拥有不同文化背景的人经常以完全不同的方式解读同一种面部表情。

questions.sentence: The bridge was designed not just for its physical s_____ but also for its aesthetic beauty.
questions.translation: 这座桥的设计不仅是为了其物理强度，也是为了它的审美价值。（not just... but also... 结构）

questions.sentence: After the long and exhausting debate, the committee finally reached a c_____ that satisfied both sides.
questions.translation: 经过漫长而令人筋疲力尽的辩论，委员会终于达成了一个让双方都满意的妥协。（注：无 compromise，改用 conclusion 不在，solution 在）*修正：

questions.sentence: After the long and exhausting debate, the committee finally found a s_____ that satisfied both sides.
questions.translation: 经过漫长而令人筋疲力尽的辩论，委员会终于找到了一个让双方都满意的解决方案。

questions.sentence: She was so a_____ in her novel that she didn't even notice the fire alarm ringing.
questions.translation: 她如此沉浸在小说中，以至于甚至没有注意到火警响了。（注：无 absorb，用 addict 或 focus）*修正：

questions.sentence: He was so f_____ on his video game that he didn't even notice the fire alarm ringing.
questions.translation: 他如此专注于电子游戏，以至于甚至没有注意到火警响了。（被动结构或形容词化）

questions.sentence: What is particularly i_____ about this project is that it is entirely funded by charitable donations.
questions.translation: 这个项目特别令人印象深刻的地方在于，它完全由慈善捐款资助。（主语从句 + 表语从句）

questions.sentence: Any change to the schedule must be approved by the headmaster in a_____, meaning at least one week prior.
questions.translation: 对时间表的任何更改都必须提前得到校长的批准，即至少提前一周。（in advance 固定搭配）

questions.sentence: His poor p_____ in the final exam could be attributed to his lack of sleep the night before.
questions.translation: 他在期末考试中糟糕的表现可归因于他前一天晚上缺乏睡眠。

questions.sentence: R_____ than arguing with him, she chose to stay silent and walked away.
questions.translation: 她选择保持沉默并走开，而不是与他争吵。（Rather than 结构）

questions.sentence: The hotel provides free internet access to its guests, e_____ them to stay connected with their families.
questions.translation: 酒店为客人提供免费网络，使他们能够与家人保持联系。（分词作结果状语）

questions.sentence: Before making a decision, you should weigh the potential risks against the likely b_____.
questions.translation: 在做决定之前，你应该权衡潜在的风险和可能的好处。

questions.sentence: Due to the storm, the flight was delayed, which caused much a_____ among the waiting passengers.
questions.translation: 由于风暴，航班延误了，这在等待的乘客中引起了极大的焦虑。（非限制性定语从句，词形：anxious -> anxiety）

questions.sentence: S_____ inside the old book was a letter written by his grandfather fifty years ago.
questions.translation: 夹在那本旧书里的是他祖父五十年前写的一封信。（注：词表无 stick，改用 hide 无，改用 sheet 词义不符，改用 plain? 改用 content? 改用 contain：）*修正：

questions.sentence: The envelope did not c_____ any money, but a letter written by his grandfather fifty years ago.
questions.translation: 信封里装的不是钱，而是他祖父五十年前写的一封信。

questions.sentence: In this modern era, a person's level of success is often m_____ by their wealth, which is quite narrow-minded.
questions.translation: 在这个现代，一个人的成功水平往往是通过他们的财富来衡量的，这是相当狭隘的。（被动语态）

questions.sentence: The new manager is very popular because of her positive a_____ towards problem-solving.
questions.translation: 新经理很受欢迎，因为她对待解决问题的积极态度。（注：无 attitude，有 approach）*修正：

questions.sentence: The new manager is very popular because of her positive a_____ to problem-solving.
questions.translation: 新经理很受欢迎，因为她解决问题的积极方法（方式）。

questions.sentence: Parents should encourage their children's c_____ by allowing them to draw and build whatever they imagine.
questions.translation: 父母应该通过允许孩子们画画和建造他们想象的任何东西来鼓励他们的创造力。（词形：creative -> creativity）

questions.sentence: Without a valid passport, you are u_____ to be allowed to board the international flight.
questions.translation: 如果没有有效的护照，你不大可能被允许登上国际航班。（词形：likely -> unlikely）

questions.sentence: The two countries have a history of c_____ but are now working together for a peaceful future.
questions.translation: 这两个国家有一段冲突的历史，但现在为了一个和平的未来而共同努力。

questions.sentence: When writing an academic paper, it is essential to cite the s_____ of your information to avoid plagiarism.
questions.translation: 在写学术论文时，为了避免抄袭，引用你信息的来源是必不可少的。

questions.sentence: Even though he is in his seventies, the f_____ soldier still maintains his daily jogging habit.
questions.translation: 尽管已经七十多岁了，这位前士兵仍然保持着他每天慢跑的习惯。

questions.sentence: To prevent the disease from spreading, strictly h_____ living habits must be promoted.
questions.translation: 为了防止疾病传播，必须提倡严格的健康生活习惯。（注：词表有 lifestyle, prevent, harm. 换考 harm）*修正：

questions.sentence: To p_____ the disease from spreading, strictly isolated conditions must be maintained in the hospital.
questions.translation: 为了防止疾病传播，医院里必须维持严格的隔离条件。

questions.sentence: In traditional Chinese c_____, red is the color of luck and happiness.
questions.translation: 在中国传统文化中，红色是幸运和幸福的颜色。（注：无 culture，有 custom）*修正：

questions.sentence: According to local c_____, guests are expected to take off their shoes before entering the house.
questions.translation: 根据当地风俗，客人们在进屋前被期望脱掉鞋子。

questions.sentence: The athlete suffered a serious ankle injury, which d_____ his dream of winning the Olympic gold medal.
questions.translation: 这名运动员脚踝受了重伤，这摧毁了他赢得奥运金牌的梦想。

questions.sentence: Seeing the child fall into the river, he jumped in without a m_____ of hesitation.
questions.translation: 看到孩子掉进河里，他毫不犹豫（没有一刻犹豫）地跳了进去。

questions.sentence: The more you read, the more likely you are to b_____ your horizons and think deeply.
questions.translation: 你读得越多，就越有可能拓宽你的视野并进行深度思考。（注：无 broaden，有 branch，无。改考 content/gain/improve）*修正：

questions.sentence: The more you read, the more likely you are to i_____ your understanding of the world.
questions.translation: 你读得越多，就越有可能增进（改善）你对世界的理解。

questions.sentence: She has a natural t_____ for music; she can play any song on the piano after hearing it just once.
questions.translation: 她有天生的音乐天赋；任何歌听过一遍她就能在钢琴上弹出来。

questions.sentence: After the earthquake, thousands of v_____ rushed to the disaster area to help the victims.
questions.translation: 地震后，数千名志愿者冲向灾区帮助受害者。

questions.sentence: Rather than focusing on the n_____ aspects, we should look at the opportunities this change brings.
questions.translation: 我们不应关注消极方面，而应着眼于这种变化带来的机遇。

questions.sentence: The old factory was shut down because it released harmful c_____ waste into the river.
questions.translation: 由于向河里排放有害的化学废料，这家旧工厂被关闭了。

questions.sentence: While the internet provides c_____, it also brings the risk of personal information leakage.
questions.translation: 虽然互联网提供了便利，但它也带来了个人信息泄露的风险。（词形：convenient -> convenience）

questions.sentence: You should not make a judgment b_____ solely on someone's appearance.
questions.translation: 你不应该仅仅基于某人的外表就做出判断。（分词作后置定语）

questions.sentence: Despite the fierce c_____, our company managed to maintain its position as the market leader.
questions.translation: 尽管竞争激烈，我们公司还是设法保持了市场领导者的地位。

questions.sentence: The professor asked the students to write a brief s_____ of the article in their own words.
questions.translation: 教授要求学生们用自己的话写一篇这篇文章的简短摘要。

questions.sentence: Due to global warming, the c_____ of many regions has changed significantly over the past decades.
questions.translation: 由于全球变暖，许多地区的气候在过去几十年中发生了显著变化。

questions.sentence: She works for a charity o_____ that provides food and education for homeless children.
questions.translation: 她在一家为无家可归儿童提供食物和教育的慈善组织工作。（词形：organize -> organization）

questions.sentence: The detective stared at the crime scene, trying to find any h_____ that the criminal might have left behind.
questions.translation: 侦探盯着犯罪现场，试图寻找罪犯可能留下的任何线索。

questions.sentence: It is u_____ of him to be so quiet; he is usually the most talkative person in the room.
questions.translation: 他这么安静很不寻常；他通常是房间里最健谈的人。

questions.sentence: The audience burst into tears, deeply m_____ by the protagonist's tragic destiny.
questions.translation: 观众们泪流满面，深深被主角的悲惨命运所感动。（注：无 move，改用 affect 无，用 impress 无，改用 shock）*修正：

questions.sentence: The audience burst into tears, deeply s_____ by the cruelty of the protagonist's tragic destiny.
questions.translation: 观众们泪流满面，深深被主角悲惨命运的残酷所震惊。

questions.sentence: Only after the doctor explained the report in detail did the patient feel a sense of r_____.
questions.translation: 只有在医生详细解释了报告之后，病人才感到一种宽慰。（注：无 relief，有 recover，可用 recovery?）*修正：

questions.sentence: Only after months of physical therapy did the patient make a full r_____ from the serious injury.
questions.translation: 只有经过几个月的物理治疗，这位病人才从重伤中完全康复。（词形：recover -> recovery）

questions.sentence: He spent the e_____ afternoon looking for his lost keys, but still couldn't find them.
questions.translation: 他花了整整一个下午寻找他丢失的钥匙，但仍然没找到。

questions.sentence: Many teenagers s_____ with peer pressure and the desire to fit in with their classmates.
questions.translation: 许多青少年都在与同辈压力和想要融入同学的渴望作斗争。

questions.sentence: The author used a lot of vivid d_____ in her novel to bring the historical setting to life.
questions.translation: 作者在小说中使用了大量生动的描写，使历史背景栩栩如生。（复数形式）

questions.sentence: While money can buy c_____ living conditions, it cannot buy true happiness.
questions.translation: 虽然金钱可以买到舒适的生活条件，但买不到真正的幸福。（词形：comfort -> comfortable）

questions.sentence: Without mutual r_____, a healthy and long-lasting relationship is impossible to maintain.
questions.translation: 没有相互尊重，就不可能维持一段健康长久的关系。

questions.sentence: A balanced d_____, combined with regular exercise, is the key to maintaining good health.
questions.translation: 均衡的饮食，加上有规律的锻炼，是保持身体健康的关键。

questions.sentence: The boss is a highly p_____ man who demands perfection from all his employees.
questions.translation: 老板是一个高度专业的人，他对所有员工都要求完美。

questions.sentence: I am not f_____ with the local transportation system, so I need to check the map first.
questions.translation: 我不熟悉当地的交通系统，所以我需要先查一下地图。

questions.sentence: Over the past few decades, technology has t_____ the way we live and work.
questions.translation: 在过去的几十年里，技术改变了我们生活和工作的方式。（注：无 transform，有 shift? 无。改用 improve, impact）*修正：

questions.sentence: Over the past few decades, technology has deeply i_____ the way we live and work.
questions.translation: 在过去的几十年里，技术深深地影响了我们生活和工作的方式。

questions.sentence: The government has invested m_____ of dollars in upgrading the city's public transport system.
questions.translation: 政府已经投入数百万美元用于升级该市的公共交通系统。

questions.sentence: It is o_____ that the company is facing a financial crisis, as they have started laying off workers.
questions.translation: 很明显公司正面临金融危机，因为他们已经开始裁员了。（词形：obviously -> obvious）

questions.sentence: No m_____ what happens, you must stick to your principles and not give up.
questions.translation: 无论发生什么，你必须坚持你的原则，不能放弃。（注：无 matter。改用 regardless）*修正：

questions.sentence: R_____ of the outcome, you should be proud of the immense effort you have put in.
questions.translation: 不管结果如何，你都应该为你付出的巨大努力感到自豪。

questions.sentence: He lacks the p_____ required to be a good teacher; he gets angry easily when students make mistakes.
questions.translation: 他缺乏成为一名好老师所需的耐心；当学生犯错时他很容易生气。

questions.sentence: The new law aims to p_____ the rights of consumers and prevent companies from overcharging.
questions.translation: 新法律旨在保护消费者的权益，防止公司漫天要价。（注：无 protect，用 prevent，换句）*修正：

questions.sentence: The new law aims to defend the rights of consumers and p_____ companies from overcharging.
questions.translation: 新法律旨在捍卫消费者的权益，防止公司漫天要价。

questions.sentence: I'd p_____ to stay at home and read a book tonight rather than go out to a noisy party.
questions.translation: 今晚我宁愿待在家里看书，也不愿去参加喧闹的聚会。

questions.sentence: The experiment yielded results that were completely o_____ to the original hypothesis.
questions.translation: 实验产生了与最初假设完全相反（对立）的结果。

questions.sentence: F_____ from the top of the skyscraper, the cars on the street looked like tiny beetles.
questions.translation: 从摩天大楼的顶端看下去，街上的汽车看起来像小甲虫。（分词作状语，词形：view -> viewed）

questions.sentence: The final stage of the project involves a complex p_____ that requires high-level technical skills.
questions.translation: 项目的最后阶段涉及一个需要高水平技术技能的复杂过程。

questions.sentence: To pass the exam, one must not only m_____ the formulas but also understand their applications.
questions.translation: 要通过考试，一个人不仅必须记住（背诵）公式，还要理解它们的应用。（not only... but also... 结构，词表中为 memorise/memorize）

questions.sentence: She has a unique s_____ of painting that distinguishes her work from other contemporary artists.
questions.translation: 她有一种独特的绘画风格，使她的作品与其他当代艺术家的作品区分开来。

questions.sentence: The u_____ goal of our educational system should be to foster independent thinkers, not just test-takers.
questions.translation: 我们教育系统的最终目标应该是培养独立思考者，而不仅仅是应试者。

author: test
